cu.explanation_en: Setting SCTP out-streams to 0 causes SCTP association failures and prevents proper communication setup.

du.explanation_en: Setting T1a_up to [0, 0] causes timing misalignment in uplink front-haul, leading to synchronization failures and data transmission errors.
du.explanation_zh: 將 T1a_up 設定為 [0, 0] 會導致上行前傳中的時序錯位，造成同步失敗和數據傳輸錯誤。
